title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Culture_Convenience_Club
transformers_text: Culture Convenience Club Company Limited Karu chua Kon bin ien su Kur abu Kabushikigaisha is a Japanese company that operates Tsu tay a a chain of video rental shops and bookstores throughout Japan Taiwan and China 1 6 The company is headquartered in Ebisu Tokyo 7 The stock of the company was formerly listed in the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange T YO 4756 but it has since been de listed following a management buyout in 2011 8 As of December 2013 the company and its franchisees operate 1 461 Tsu tay a rental shops in Japan 9 The T Card the membership card of Tsu tay a works as a platform for a cross industry loyalty program As of May 2010 more than 35 million holders of the card earn T Points at Family Mart Book Off Lotte ria and so forth as well as Tsu tay a shops 10 11 On 17 March 2017 the company acquired magazine publishing brandT okuma Shot en The deal was expected to be completed at the end of March 12 In September 2017 the Culture Convenience Club signed a deal with China's CITI C Press Group to create a joint cultural content distribution platform citation needed
